modName: Difficulty settings with fair damage multipliers
summary: Changes the damage multipliers for all the difficulties to 1, for both the player, and the npc's.
descriptionHtml:
What this mod does, is changing the damage multipliers for all the difficulties to 1, for both the player, and the enemies.

I always hated how playing on Legendary would make an enemy with a stick hit me for x6 the damage I would hit him with, if I had been using the same stick.

It's really just a quick tweak that I did for my own use, but I guess someone else might want something similar as-well, so why not share it?


I would not recommend using this on vanilla skyrim however, because then the game would become way to easy.

For making it harder and also more fun, I would recommend using the mods listed below.

Deadly Combat
Attack Commitment No turning during attacks
Combat Behavior Improved
TK HitStop
Combat Evolved - Core
Pseudo parry animation mod


FAQ

Q: Why not just use the vanilla adept difficulty?
A: Cus with this tweak I can now longer change the difficulty to make the game easier, if I were to meet a hard boss or something.
